snippet: LEAD: Citing accelerated cutting of redwoods by a lumber company, State Assemblyman Byron Sher says he will introduce legislation Monday to outlaw the practice of cutting down entire stands of ancient redwoods and impose civil fines of up to $50,0...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Citing accelerated cutting of redwoods by a lumber company, State Assemblyman Byron Sher says he will introduce legislation Monday to outlaw the practice of cutting down entire stands of ancient redwoods and impose civil fines of up to $50,000 for violations.

headline.main: California Bill Would Curb Cutting of Redwoods

byline.original: By LAWRENCE M. FISHER, Special to the New York Times
